REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0893 reute r f BC-DATAPRODUCTS-<DPC>-GE 03-11 0056

TEXT.TITLE: DATAPRODUCTS <DPC> GETS SIEMENS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Dataproducts Corp said it received a multi-year contract, valued at more than 30 mln dlrs, to supply band printers to <Siemens AG> of West Germany. Siemens will use the printers for office applications and for medium to large mainframes, Dataproducts said. Reuter
